mapper.insert: insert into contract (c_code, start_period, end_period, c_date, work_place_name, c_id, p_id, fileName, email_check) values( c_code_seq.NEXTVAL, to_date(#{start_period},'yy/mm/dd'), to_date(#{end_period},'yy/mm/dd'), to_date(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd'), #{work_place_name}, #{c_id}, #{p_id}, #{fileName}, '0')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contract WHERE c_id = #{id} OR p_id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM contract WHERE c_id = ('c'||#{id[0]}) AND p_id = ('p'||#{id[1]}) AND rownum = 1
UPDATE contract set fileName = (substr(fileName,0,length(fileName)-4)||'.pdf'), email_check = '1' WHERE fileName LIKE ('%'||#{fileName}||'.png')
SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM contract WHERE (p_id = #{id} OR c_id = #{id}) AND rownum > 0
SELECT c_code, work_place_name, p_id, c_id, start_period, end_period, email_check FROM contract WHERE p_id = #{id} OR c_id = #{id} ORDER BY start_period LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT c_code, work_place_name, start_period, end_period, email_check FROM (SELECT rownum rn, c_code, work_place_name, p_id, c_id, start_period , end_period, email_check from contract where p_id = #{id} OR c_id = #{id} order by start_period desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
